name: pnp-list-formatting-random-item
title: Random Item
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates utilizing layering to draw all rows on top of each other and then the z-index is set to a randomized value to determine which row to draw on the very top.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates utilizing layering to draw all rows on top of each other and then the z-index is set to a randomized value to determine which row to draw on the very top. This can easily be added to a page using the list web part and will act as a miniature application.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
